results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} 2^k * binomial(n,k) * binomial(n^2+k+1,n)/(n^2+k+1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..297
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[2^k * Binomial[n, k] * Binomial[n^2 + k + 1, n]/(n^2 + k + 1), {k, 0, n}];  Array[a, 17, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 27 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 26 2020
